summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 discussing the circulation and revision of an Excel analysis file titled 'Epstein Trust Analysis v6.xlsx'. The analysis summarizes and tracks Epstein trust documents, including amendments, properties, provisions, and the roles of trustees.

persons.name: Indyke
persons.context: Added to the summary tab of the trust analysis document, indicating involvement as a trustee of Epstein's trusts.

persons.name: Kahn
persons.context: Added to the summary tab of the trust analysis document, indicating involvement as a trustee of Epstein's trusts.

connections.description: Both are listed as trustees in the analysis of Epstein's trust documents.

events.title: Initial Trust Analysis Circulated
events.description: An initial version of the Epstein trust analysis document is circulated via email.

events.title: Revised Trust Analysis Circulated
events.description: A revised version of the Epstein trust analysis is circulated, adding trustees Indyke and Kahn and tracking properties and estate provisions.

keyFacts: The document references a detailed Excel analysis ('Epstein Trust Analysis v6.xlsx') of Jeffrey Epstein's trust documents.
The trust analysis includes tabs for each trust, chronological amendments, a key, and a summary.
Trustees Indyke and Kahn were added to the summary tab in a revised version of the analysis.
The analysis tracks properties and provisions allocating a percentage of the remaining estate.
The email chain indicates ongoing financial analysis of Epstein's estate structures in early 2020.
